subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Daisuke Matsuzaka nearly gave away a nine-run lead, but Mike Lowell hit a three-run homer and drove in four runs last night to lead the host Boston Red Sox past the Toronto Blue Jays, 13-10.
snippet: Daisuke Matsuzaka nearly gave away a nine-run lead, but Mike Lowell hit a three-run homer and drove in four runs last night to lead the host Boston Red Sox past the Toronto Blue Jays, 13-10.
